name: Terrorisar la Popula
description:
Welcome to the Cuban Missile Operation 

Your goal destroy USA drone by the help of the new MCI(Missile control Interface)

All the target marqued on your map have to be destroy an be sure to avoir destroying city else Barack Obama will notice it and call Uour departement 

Use the button to give the instruction to the missile and launch it with the arrow on downside of the screen

To toggle between view press Space a
